Name: 獣王/BEAST KING
About the game: BEAST KING, a great hit pachislot machine in 2000, released on STEAM! BEAST KING is equipped with not only BB(Big Bonus) and RB(Regular Bonus), but also SAVANNA CHANCE, a new bonus system. You can get any of these bonuses with high probability! A masterpiece of pachislot machine, which loads ultimate SAVANNA CHANCE, appears now! ■ABOUT SAVANNA CHANCE You get SAVANNA CHANCE when the letter “A” appears as a pixel image. There is two types of expected value; SAVANNA CHANCE continues 30games or 10 games. Similar to BB, you can get large number of tokens when you win SAVANNA CHANCE keep on 30 games. During SAVANNA CHANCE you are needed to press the button at the right time according to the pixel images or lamps on the left side instructs. You can get 15 tokens at once. You know you win a bonus when the sounds stop in the middle of SAVANNA CHANCE. SAVANNA CHANCE continues after you finished bonus games. ■ABOUT PACHISLOT 1. Insert tokens into a token slot. 2. Push buttons to stop reels. 3. Match figures on reels such as “7”s then you get some tokens. 4. The important thing is to stop reels at any position you aim. To get more information, please check the manual on the right side.
